0.text: Innate: Whenever Nilah kills a  minion, she and the nearest allied  champion gain an additional  50% of the experience they would have lost from sharing.
0.html: Innate: Whenever Nilah kills a minion, she and the nearest allied champion gain an additional  50% of the experience they would have lost from sharing.
markedPassages: minion
champion
50% of the experience

1.text: Innate: Whenever a nearby allied champion uses an ability to  heal or  shield either Nilah or themselves, both they and Nilah receive a bonus amount equal to 7.5% of the healing or 15% of the shielding after a 0.5-second delay. Bonus shielding lasts as long as the shield that triggered the effect, up to a maximum duration of 4 seconds.
1.html: Innate: Whenever a nearby allied champion uses an ability to heal or shield either Nilah or themselves, both they and Nilah receive a bonus amount equal to 7.5% of the healing or 15% of the shielding after a 0.5-second delay. Bonus shielding lasts as long as the shield that triggered the effect, up to a maximum duration of 4 seconds.
markedPassages: heal
shield

0.text: Passive: Nilah gains  0% − 33% (based on critical strike chance) armor penetration. Her basic attacks and Formless Blade  heal her for 0% − 20% (based on critical strike chance) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to  champions, converting each heal instance beyond maximum health into a  shield that last 6 seconds.
0.html: Passive: Nilah gains  0% − 33% (based on critical strike chance) armor penetration. Her basic attacks and Formless Blade heal her for 0% − 20% (based on critical strike chance) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to champions, converting each heal instance beyond maximum health into a shield that last 6 seconds.
markedPassages: 0% − 33% (based on critical strike chance)
heal
champions
shield

1.text: Active: Nilah cracks her whip-blade in a line in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, increased by 0% − 120% (based on critical strike chance). Formless Blade can hit structures and applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.
1.html: Active: Nilah cracks her whip-blade in a line in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, increased by 0% − 120% (based on critical strike chance). Formless Blade can hit structures and applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.
markedPassages: life steal

2.text: If Formless Blade is cast during  Slipstream, Nilah leaves behind a wave that is sent towards her location at the end of the dash, dealing the same damage to enemies hit.
2.html: If Formless Blade is cast during Slipstream, Nilah leaves behind a wave that is sent towards her location at the end of the dash, dealing the same damage to enemies hit.
markedPassages: Slipstream

3.text: If Formless Blade hits an enemy, Nilah empowers herself for 4 seconds: gaining  125 bonus attack range and  10% − 60% (based on level) bonus attack speed, and causing her basic attacks to strike in a cone that deals 100% AD physical damage to enemies hit. Against secondary non-champion targets, this is reduced to 33% AD for  minions and 10% AD for  monsters, and additionally executes minions left below  20 health.  On-hit effects are applied only to the primary target.
3.html: If Formless Blade hits an enemy, Nilah empowers herself for 4 seconds: gaining  125 bonus attack range and  10% − 60% (based on level) bonus attack speed, and causing her basic attacks to strike in a cone that deals 100% AD physical damage to enemies hit. Against secondary non-champion targets, this is reduced to 33% AD for minions and 10% AD for monsters, and additionally executes minions left below  20 health. On-hit effects are applied only to the primary target.
markedPassages: 125 bonus attack range
10% − 60% (based on level) bonus attack speed
10% − 60% (based on level) bonus attack speed
minions
monsters
20 health
On-hit

0.text: Active: Nilah envelops herself in mist for 2.25 seconds, during which she becomes  ghosted, gains  bonus movement speed, reduces all incoming magic damage taken by 25%, and  dodges all non- turret basic attacks.
0.html: Active: Nilah envelops herself in mist for 2.25 seconds, during which she becomes ghosted, gains  bonus movement speed, reduces all incoming magic damage taken by 25%, and dodges all non- turret basic attacks.
markedPassages: ghosted
bonus movement speed
dodges
turret

1.text: Allied champions she touches will also be enveloped for 1.5 seconds, gaining the same effects.
1.html: Allied champions she touches will also be enveloped for 1.5 seconds, gaining the same effects.

0.text: Active: Nilah  dashes a fixed distance in the direction of the target unit, dealing physical damage to enemies she passes through.
0.html: Active: Nilah dashes a fixed distance in the direction of the target unit, dealing physical damage to enemies she passes through.
markedPassages: dashes

1.text: Nilah periodically stocks a Slipstream charge, up to a maximum of 2.
1.html: Nilah periodically stocks a Slipstream charge, up to a maximum of 2.

2.text: Slipstream  resets Nilah's basic attack timer.  Formless Blade and  Apotheosis can be cast during the dash.
2.html: Slipstream resets Nilah's basic attack timer. Formless Blade and Apotheosis can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: resets
Formless Blade
Apotheosis
possibleConcerningAbilities: Slipstream  resets Nilah's basic attack timer.  Formless Blade and  Apotheosis can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Nilah whirls her whip-blade over 1 second, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies every 0.25 seconds. She then unleashes a burst that deals physical damage and  pulls them 250 units towards her. Each hit also  slows targets by 10% for 3 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits.
0.html: Active: Nilah whirls her whip-blade over 1 second, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies every 0.25 seconds. She then unleashes a burst that deals physical damage and pulls them 250 units towards her. Each hit also slows targets by 10% for 3 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits.
markedPassages: pulls
slows

1.text: Nilah  heals herself and nearby allied champions for 20% − 50% (based on critical strike chance) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to  champions, reduced to 10% against non-champions, converting each heal instance beyond maximum health into a  shield that last 6 seconds.
1.html: Nilah heals herself and nearby allied champions for 20% − 50% (based on critical strike chance) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to champions, reduced to 10% against non-champions, converting each heal instance beyond maximum health into a shield that last 6 seconds.
markedPassages: heals
champions
shield

2.text: Nilah is unable to basic attack and cast her other abilities during Apotheosis, but she is able to move.
2.html: Nilah is unable to basic attack and cast her other abilities during Apotheosis, but she is able to move.
